summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof's Full Texturizing Foam is an innovative dry foam that delivers 3x more texture on wet or dry hair. Use to style, restyle, or revive hair for an effortless look that lasts all day.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers 3x more textured hair*Lightweight formula provides an airy, beachy, or textured style that lasts all dayDry foam delivery provides style longevity with a lightweight finishLeaves hair with a lived-in look and feelWorks with wet or dry application and with multiple styling methodsHeat protection up to 450¬∞F/232¬∞C*Versus untreatedKey IngredientsTime-Released Styling Technology: Proprietary, time-released technology formulated with Living Proof's patented Thickening Molecule and water-soluble resins to create long-lasting body, fullness, and hold - without the stickiness.Salt-free texturizing agents: Blend of naturally derived actives that increase a texturized look and feel.Amaranth peptides: Plumps individual hair fibers for bouncy, fuller-looking hair.Hydrolyzed corn starch: Provides light oil absorption to aid in style longevity.Optimized resin blend: Enhances texture and provides lasting hold without leaving behind a sticky feel.Mushroom extract blend: Provides heat protection to prevent thermal damage.Formulated WithoutSiliconesSulfates (SLS + SLES)ParabensPhthalatesFormaldehydeItem 2609971How To UseApply to clean, damp, detangled hair. For a lived-in look, blow dry and finger style. For a textured blowout, style with a blow-dryer and round brush. Finish with a small amount on dry hair for added texture and hold.Bonus usage: For beachy, air-dried hair, style by scrunching in and let air-dry for a textured look.Hair type: Fine, thin, and low-density hair types.IngredientsWater/Eau/Aqua, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Polysorbate 20, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, PVP, Sodium Polyitaconate, Polyimide-1, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, VP/VA Copolymer, Polyalkylaminoester-1, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyporus Umbellatus (Mushroom) Extract, Glycerin, Fructose, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PPG-2 Myristyl Ether Proprionate, Oleth-10, Phospholipids, Fragrance/Parfum, Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Citral, LimoneneShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp, detangled hair. For a lived-in look, blow dry and finger style. For a textured blowout, style with a blow-dryer and round brush. Finish with a small amount on dry hair for added texture and hold.Bonus usage: For beachy, air-dried hair, style by scrunching in and let air-dry for a textured look.Hair type: Fine, thin, and low-density hair types.

reviews.headline: Adds Thickness
reviews.comments: This is great for adding thickness and fullness. Depending on how much you use, you will feel like you have product in your hair. So I would go light if you don't like that feel. I section my hair and use it only at my roots, and prefer using leave in conditioner and serum on the lower half of my hair strands. For me, it would feel like too much product on the ends, making it hard to comb or brush through.

reviews.headline: Not For Me
reviews.comments: I have fine, thin hair that sits between ears & neck.  I want movable hold without the sticky, crunchy, greasy feel.  I had it figured out when hair was a little longer, but trying to figure it out with new cut.  Used Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray after Full Moisturizing Foam.  These 2 products did not do that for me.   Hair feels like there is a weighted film of slightly sticky, greasy, damp feel.  Had to rewash hair. I will add that I'm not a fan of dry shampoo.  If you are, you may like it.  It's a no go for me.

reviews.headline: Great light weight mousse
reviews.comments: This gave me a lot of volume in my ends, not as much in my roots. My style holds for a lot longer and I feel like my hair really does get oily slower. I was able to go a little longer without washing my hair. It did seem to take away a bit of shine that I usually get with my blowouts but otherwise I loved it! I was able to add the shine back in with other products.

reviews.headline: Great light weight mousse
reviews.comments: This gave me a lot of volume in my ends, not as much in my roots. My style holds for a lot longer and I feel like my hair really does get oily slower. I was able to go a little longer without washing my hair. It did seem to take away a bit of shine that I usually get with my blowouts but otherwise I loved it! I was able to add the shine back in with other products.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I have used this four times and each time it has added volume and staying power to my blow dry.

reviews.headline: First time purchasing
reviews.comments: Adds extra body

reviews.headline: Not for fine hair
reviews.comments: I purchased this after reading an article on volume products for fine hair.  It made my hair so sticky and gave it too much texture.  My flat iron was stuck in my hair and singed it.  Returned.

reviews.headline: New holy grail for fine wavy hair!
reviews.comments: Wow! I have fine wavy hair that needs lightweight products to function. This product is incredible! I've never seen my hair with so much volume and definition. New holy grail!

reviews.headline: Perfect for fine hair girlies
reviews.comments: I'm a big fan of LP and have been for years. If you have fine hair you need this.  It's perfect for adding both volume and texture to my fine hair. I love that it can be used on wet or dry hair, making it just the thing to help revive second day hair. Bonus that it comes in a travel size.

reviews.headline: Thin hair girls buy!!
reviews.comments: Helps hold shark airwrap curls all day on someone with thin hair that struggles to hold a curl!

reviews.headline: Loving and living proof that this works
reviews.comments: Someone who has fine hair and nothing works for volume or texture, I was very pleased with this product. My hair is usally oily after 12 hours from washing and after 12 hours of using this product and my dyson airwrap to style, I still have volume at the end of the day! Definitely recommend this product!! Not heavy on the hair and it does what it says!

reviews.headline: Weightless
reviews.comments: This is the perfect styling aid! It's light weight, doesn't make your hair sticky or clumpy. I have baby fine super straight hair and there isn't a lot anymore. This doe not weight my hair down at all. I dry and style my hair after applying it and I have volume. fullness my hair looks great !

reviews.headline: I hate this
reviews.comments: Didn't add volume or texture, also doesn't smell the greatest. This product actually weighed my hair down and made my waves look absolutely terrible. I try really hard to not return things but this will be going back.

reviews.headline: Game Changer
reviews.comments: I can't live without this product! It makes my fine, flat hair voluminous and it actually adds hold to the style. It works beautifully every time. I love this product! Thank you Living Proof!!!

reviews.headline: The answer to your high hair prayers
reviews.comments: This stuff right here-don't even hesitate‚Ä¶ BUY IT RIGHT NOW! I am rhe granddaughter of a hair stylist and I have tried every single "volume" brand on the market and absolutely nothing compares to how amazing this works! My fine hair finally has some lift! I swear, this makes my hair stand up off my scalp and even prevents it from being so oily. This will last me 6-8 months using 2-3 pumps. It's fantastic and definitely worth the money!

reviews.headline: This is a must if you have fine limp hair!!
reviews.comments: This not only volumes your hair, but it also lasts!! It's the only product that holds up to my fine limp hair!

reviews.headline: Does the job
reviews.comments: Gives my short hair some much needed texture and a wee bit of hold, love the clean feel of the foam and smells great also.

reviews.headline: I may purchase again.
reviews.comments: I am always looking for good volumising products. This one works ok.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments:
This is my second bottle after I used up all of the smaller one - and I love this product!!!
I have fine, highlighted blonde hair - a little dry at the ends üôà but this.... thiiiissss... is my holy grail! It gives my hair so much volume and body, while it still stays soft... it doesn't feel like straw, sticky, or like an extra layer of product is on my hair. My hair holds a curl or being straightened very well with this! It also smells good! I'm in love ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I tried this for my bangs so I can get some style out of them. This works great using a brush to curl them.

media.headline: I'd highly recommend it especially to those with thin hair!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently received the Living Proof Full Texturizing Foam as a gift and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed! As someone with fine and thinning hair, finding the right styling product can be a challenge, so I welcomed giving this foam a try. 

The Living Proof Full Texturizing Foam adds volume and texture to my hair without weighing it down or making it feel sticky. It's easy to apply and doesn't leave any residue behind. I love that it gives my hair a naturally fuller look that lasts all day.

I also appreciate that this product is made without harmful chemicals like sulfates, parabens, and phthalates, making it a great choice for those who are conscious about the ingredients in their hair care products.

Overall, I highly recommend the Living Proof Full Texturizing Foam for anyone with fine or thinning hair who wants to add volume and texture to their style. It's a must-have in my hair care routine now and I will definitely be repurchasing it in the future. Thank you to Living Proof for creating such a fantastic product!
This product was complimentary from Living Proof
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for fine and thinning hair!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using the Full Texturizing Foam for just about a week now since receiving it complimentary from Living Proof. I have very fine, thin hair and love mousse products to build volume in my normally flat hair. I think this foam does a decent job of providing volume but typically foam from a pump delivery system such as this does not give me the most volume. I think its great for every day but if I really want big hair, I have other mousse products that will give me the mega volume I am looking for. It certainly smells nice and does not dry my hair out, but would I purchase? Probably not. That being said, I have other Living Proof products I absolutely adore!
faceoff_negative.headline: Good for everyday volume, but not mega volume.
